name: Oh Wizard
description: You have to play as a strange wizard, and you need to get out of the fairy-tale world. ------------------------------------------------------- Feel free to rate the game and leave comments. The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :) ------------------------------------------------------- Game controls: A - move left D - move right W - jump K - attack mouse ------------------------------------------------------- Thank you so much for sharing your music!!! *VOiD1 Gaming -------------------------------------------------------
